
(a) Error is detected by all four schemes :
	(original 32 bit codeword | corrupt 32 bit codeword) 

    01000011100101101010001001100100 | 01000001010011101110011001001001
    00111011011111100000111101010111 | 00010011011011100000111010010110


(b) Error is detected by checksum but not by CRC : 
	(original 32 bit codeword | corrupt 32 bit codeword)

    10000011001100001001010101011111 | 10000011001100010001010101011010
    00011110111011011010100000111001 | 00011110111011000010100000111100


(c) Error is detected by VRC but not by CRC : 
	(original 32 bit codeword | corrupt 32 bit codeword)

    11000001111000000110100011110100 | 00000111011000000110100011110100
    10011111101001110110110000001000 | 10011111101001110110110110000101
